title: I dropped my pixel 3 and now it is constantly trying to restart unsuccessfully. I get the google
content: I dropped the pixel three and now it is trying to restart.  I get the google sign and some spinning but then the screen blacks out and then the phone tries to restart again.  The loop just keeps repeating.  Once in a while if I hold the volume and the on button I get a no command screen and as soon as I release the buttons it the loop starts all over again
